{"id":501301306,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1622542484,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/501301306/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int m,n;\n    int ans;\n    bool vis[55][55];\n    void dfs(vector<vector<int>>& g,int x,int y){\n        if(x<0 || y<0 || x>=m || y>=n) return;\n        if(g[x][y]==0 || vis[x][y]==true) return;\n        vis[x][y]=true;\n        ans++;\n        dfs(g,x,y+1);\n        dfs(g,x+1,y);\n        dfs(g,x,y-1);\n        dfs(g,x-1,y);\n    }\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        m=grid.size();\n        n=grid[0].size();\n        int res=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                vis[i][j]=false;\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                ans=0;\n                if(grid[i][j]!=0 && vis[i][j]==false) dfs(grid,i,j);\n                res=max(ans,res);\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
